resources: CameraStrike OK We need access to your camera to detect faces and codes. Requires access to the memory for storing code. The application can not be started because there is no permission for the camera. The detector can not be loaded due to the small amount of memory. Training Death Match Scan your code to log in Scan the match code Expect opponents You are killed You survived> Log in before the match Cancel Create Connect start Connected: %d Help Generate code Your code Shoot on AZTEC codes.\nHit when the aim turns green.
